name: npm-bin-deps
description: run cli dev deps with npr

scripts.vendor: npm run vendor:lockfile && npm run vendor:rimraf
scripts.vendor:rimraf: cp node_modules/rimraf/rimraf.js rimraf.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from rimraf@3.0.2.\n;' rimraf.js;
scripts.vendor:lockfile: cp node_modules/lockfile/lockfile.js lockfile.js; sed -i '1s;^;// Copied from lockfile@1.0.4.\n;' lockfile.js; sed -i 's#require(\x27signal-exit\x27)#function noop() {}#' lockfile.js

author: Raynos
